long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Scroll Genie - Simplify Your Web Browsing Experience

Tired of endless scrolling? With Scroll Genie, navigating through long webpages has never been easier. This lightweight Chrome extension lets you instantly scroll to the top or bottom of any page with just a click. Customize your experience by selecting your preferred button colors, adjusting opacity, and positioning the buttons exactly where you want them—left or right.

Key Features:

- One-Click Scrolling: Quickly jump to the top or bottom of any page with dedicated buttons.

- Customization Options: Personalize the appearance of your scroll buttons—choose colors, set opacity levels, and decide button placement.

- Seamless Integration: Scroll Genie is designed to be intuitive and blends effortlessly into your browsing experience.

- Easy Setup: Install in seconds, and adjust your settings with the simple-to-use configuration menu.

Scroll Genie is perfect for those who browse large websites, read long articles, or just want a more efficient way to navigate online content. Install now and make scrolling effortless!

💻 Scroll Genie: How to Use?

Getting Started with Scroll Genie

1. Install the Extension:

- Head to the Chrome Web Store and search for "Scroll Genie."
- Click "Add to Chrome" to install the extension.
- Once installed, you'll see the Scroll Genie icon in your browser's toolbar.

2. Using the Scroll Buttons:

- On any webpage, two buttons will appear, allowing you to scroll to the top or bottom with a single click.
- Click the top button to instantly scroll to the top of the page.
- Click the bottom button to scroll down to the very bottom.

3. Customizing Scroll Genie:

- Click the Scroll Genie icon in your toolbar and select "⚙ Extension Settings."
- Adjust the color of the top and bottom buttons to match your preferences.
- Set the button opacity to blend them seamlessly into your browsing experience.
- Choose the position of the buttons: right or left side of the screen.
- After making your selections, click "Save" to apply the settings.

4. Managing Scroll Genie:

- If you need to adjust settings later, simply click the Scroll Genie icon and access the settings page.
- To disable or remove the extension, go to Chrome’s extension management 
- page by typing chrome://extensions/ into your browser, and find Scroll Genie.

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

1. Where can I find the Scroll Genie buttons on a webpage?

The buttons will appear on the left or right side of your screen, depending on your settings. They’ll be visible on any webpage, making it easy to scroll to the top or bottom.

2. Can I customize the appearance of the scroll buttons?

Yes! You can change the color, opacity, and position of the buttons through the extension’s settings menu.

3. Why are the buttons not appearing on certain websites?

Some websites may have custom scripts or styles that interfere with extension functions. If the buttons aren’t visible, try refreshing the page or adjusting the button position in the settings.

4. How do I change the scroll button position?

Open the Scroll Genie settings by clicking the extension icon in your toolbar. In the settings menu, you can choose whether the buttons appear on the right or left side of the screen.

5. What should I do if Scroll Genie stops working?

First, ensure the extension is still enabled by visiting chrome://extensions/. If it’s enabled but not functioning correctly, try disabling and re-enabling it. If issues persist, you can reinstall the extension.

6. How do I uninstall Scroll Genie?

To uninstall, go to chrome://extensions/, find Scroll Genie, and click the "Remove" button. This will completely remove the extension from your browser.

7. Is Scroll Genie safe to use?

Absolutely! Scroll Genie is designed with your privacy in mind and does not collect any personal data or track your browsing activities.
